mapper.select: SELECT menu_cd, pmenu_cd, coalesce(level_no,0) level_no, menu_nm, menu_link_url, menu_icon_img, active_yn, module_nm, coalesce(sort_no,0) sort_no, m_type FROM nvmenu WHERE pmenu_cd IS NULL AND active_yn = 'Y' ORDER BY sort_no

SELECT a.menu_cd, a.pmenu_cd, coalesce(a.level_no,0) level_no, b.menu_nm, a.menu_link_url, a.menu_icon_img, a.active_yn, a.module_nm, coalesce(a.sort_no,0) sort_no, a.m_type FROM nvmenu a, nvmenu_lang b WHERE a.menu_cd = b.menu_cd AND a.pmenu_cd IS NOT NULL AND a.active_yn = 'Y' AND b.lang = #{lang} ORDER BY a.pmenu_cd, a.sort_no, a.menu_cd

SELECT a.grp_cd, a.menu_cd, a.read_auth, a.write_auth, a.execute_auth, b.menu_link_url FROM nvgrpmenurole a, nvmenu b WHERE a.menu_cd = b.menu_cd AND a.grp_cd = #{grpCd} AND b.active_yn = 'Y' AND b.pmenu_cd IS NOT NULL ORDER BY substr(pmenu_cd, 1, 2), sort_no

SELECT c.pmenu_cd, c.menu_cd, c.menu_nm, d.user_id, d.read_auth, d.write_auth, d.execute_auth FROM ( SELECT a.pmenu_cd, a.menu_cd, b.menu_nm FROM nvmenu a, nvmenu_lang b WHERE a.menu_cd = b.menu_cd AND a.active_yn = 'Y' AND b.lang = #{language} ) c LEFT OUTER JOIN nvmenurole d ON c.menu_cd = d.menu_cd AND d.user_id = #{userId} ORDER by c.menu_cd

SELECT c.pmenu_cd, c.menu_cd, c.menu_nm, d.read_auth, d.write_auth, d.execute_auth FROM ( SELECT a.pmenu_cd, a.menu_cd, b.menu_nm FROM nvmenu a, nvmenu_lang b WHERE a.menu_cd = b.menu_cd AND a.active_yn = 'Y' AND b.lang = #{language} ) c LEFT OUTER JOIN nvgrpmenurole d ON c.menu_cd = d.menu_cd AND d.grp_cd = #{grpCd} ORDER BY c.menu_cd
SELECT a.menu_link_url, a.menu_cd, b.read_auth, b.write_auth, b.execute_auth FROM nvmenu a, nvmenurole b WHERE a.menu_cd = b.menu_cd AND a.menu_link_url IS NOT NULL AND b.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT a.menu_link_url, a.menu_cd, b.read_auth, b.write_auth, b.execute_auth FROM nvmenu a, nvgrpmenurole b WHERE a.menu_cd = b.menu_cd AND a.menu_link_url IS NOT NULL AND b.grp_cd = #{grpCd}
